= Introduction =

Welcome to Global Menu's webpage. Than you for downloading and testing this alpha version of a Global Menu for Gnome.
 * If you've noticed any strange behaviour head to BugReporting
 * If you would like to suggest a feature or an improvement, head to FeatureRequest
 * If you would like to help, see the [FAQ FAQ]
 * If you're asking yourself a question about Global Menu, head to the [FAQ FAQ]
 * To get connected with other users in your local language, please visit [LocalSupport Local User Groups]
 * To know which applications are (or are not) working well with GlobalMenu, head to the [ApplicationCompatibility Application Compatibility page]
